programme.desc: Rocket Ski Rescue - Crusher’s Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: When I Grow Up - A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Into the Blueniverse - It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Runaway Rocket - When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Game Over/Forever Young - Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Astonished And Amazed - In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Spark Bug - Blaze, Stripes, and AJ are racing through the jungle when Stripes discovers a lost little fire beetle named Sparky. Blaze and his friends set off across the jungle to help Sparky get back home to the top of a red hot volcano.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pizza / Pups Save Skye - Alex and Mr. Porter are delivering pizza dough for a big party when the van spins out of control. Pups to the rescue! // Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Save Farmer Alex - Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game / The Fin-ale - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV. // When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington And The Fundraising - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: The Taste Badge - Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether it's delicious or horrible, so they make their own adventurous smoothies showcasing their favourite flavours to discover what taste is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves to go on a voyage of discovery inside Enid, to find out what's making her cough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Statue of Liberty, USA - Grandmaster Glitch makes the Statue of Liberty fall right into the path of a passing ferry.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: The Brandenburg Gate, Germany - When Grandmaster Glitch takes the quadriga from the Brandenburg Gate, the Go Jetters must stop him before he reaches Grim HQ.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep40
programme.desc: Water - Kit and Pup have discovered a leak! They try lots of ways to collect the water but the leak won't stop. What should they do?

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Lion - Dee encourages a friend to say lion and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep112
programme.desc: Dizzy - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. The Teletubbies have fun getting dizzy on the Tubby Spinny.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Changes - A little Hoot lands on the Clanger's planet and causes mayhem with his incessant mischievous hooting.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Almost Tony - Gwen, Bob and Tony learn a new lesson about the importance of their special friendship.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: Twisty Turny - When HQ gets twisted up, tensions are stretched tight to fix the problem.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Greatest Gift - Monty has no money to buy a gift for his mum. He wonders if a gift has to be large or cost money to be special.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep53
programme.desc: Take a Break - When Monty sees Violet enjoying doing absolutely nothing, he starts to wonder if it is a good thing to take a break and relax.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: The Thing that Shone - Three young Dinopaws and their parents recount the story of Gwen, Bob and Tony on one dark cold night and their quest to find light and warmth.

programme.title: Teddles (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Wash Your Hands - Teddles and Cat-Cat have been playing outside when Mayory reminds them about washing their hands before they eat.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Snow Is My Favourite And My Best - Snow is on the way and Lola is bursting with excitement. When it arrives Charlie, Lola, Marv and Lotta have a wonderful time in the park.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: It's time to build a snowman! - It's a snowy day and JoJo and Gran Gran go to the park to build a snow panda!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep19
programme.desc: Tree Trouble - It's the winter holidays and Dowager Hatt declares a competition to see who can find the tallest and grandest Christmas tree on Sodor. Thomas leads the chase to find the best tree.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep12
programme.desc: Salty's Surprise - It is Christmas time on the Island of Sodor and Edward and Thomas are at Brendam Docks, where Thomas is shunting trucks of presents. Salty trundles over and admires the presents train before Thomas takes it to Knapford.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: Verandah Santa (Christmas Episode) - It's Christmas Eve and Dad and the kids are taking turns pretending to be Santa! But when Socks nips Bluey, and she refuses to leave her a present, they must all learn the true meaning of being good for Christmas.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Say Snow Go - No matter how fast he clears the path, it just keeps snowing on a Citizen Po's garden!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up, the fun REALLY begins!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep32
programme.desc: The Christmas Badge - Duggee's old friend Clarence has lost his Christmas cheer, so the Squirrels try and inspire him by showing what they enjoy most about Christmas.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - It's nearly Christmas, so while Duggee wraps presents to go under the tree he asks the Squirrels if they want to decorate the clubhouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters Christmas Special: The North Pole (S)
programme.desc: A special festive edition of the colourful animation series packed with comedy, teamwork, thrilling action, great gadgets, awesome sights and funky facts about brand new places.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran Christmas Special (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time For Christmas - JoJo and Gran Gran get ready for a Christmas Party. But first they need to pick up the perfect Christmas tree from the Christmas Tree Farm.

programme.title: Garden Tales (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: The Snowman - It's a snowy day in the garden and many of the residents have never seen snow before. Casey the Badger tells Parker the Pheasant about a snowman in the top field.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S4) Ep15
programme.desc: Dougie's Essex Yule Log (Christmas) - Dougie is making a festive yule log. His yummy chocolate recipe with redcurrants is a Christmas classic. He also has a themed table gift for all his friends to enjoy.

programme.desc: Snow Joke - Captain Sinker is given a snow globe as a Christmas present from Cook and Line, but it's accidentally dropped into the Ship's Mess!

programme.desc: Christmas Rules - Everybody is looking forward to Christmas on the Scarlet Squid.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep104

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep211

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep221

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep239

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Littlefoot / Smotherly Love - Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! // Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep109

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep111

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2022 Heywire project. Presented by Karla Ranby.

programme.title: ABC News Ep104
programme.desc: The latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Miriam Corowa brings you the day's top stories as well as updated news and information as people celebrate Christmas across Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: My Story
programme.desc: Six Australians share their own personal stories of living with disability. Presented by the ABC's Disability Affairs reporter Elizabeth Wright.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - As Christmas across the Pacific beckons, the whole team, Sera, Sam, Tiana and Kiana, take a look back at their favourite stories, athletes and fans, throughout the year. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: Language and Me
programme.desc: A look at the role language plays for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people, highlighting the work done by language custodians to preserve this important aspect of our cultural and social lives. Hosted by Jack Evans.

programme.title: ABC News Ep58
programme.desc: The latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Miriam Corowa brings you the day's top stories as well as updated news and information as people celebrate Christmas across Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: The World In 2022 - Asia Pacific
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor looks at the big stories that shaped our region in 2022. From the Hunga Tonga eruption, to the assassination of Shinzo Abe, and China's push for power in the Pacific - the region has changed forever.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep104
programme.desc: Fauziah Ibrahim presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Compass Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 36 - Pentecostalism is one of the fastest growing religious movements in the world. What's the appeal and why are young people drawn to it? Compass visits the Life House Church in Murray Bridge, South Australia to find answers

programme.title: ABC News On Christmas Day Ep5
programme.desc: Fauziah Ibrahim presents a special national 7pm edition of ABC News on Christmas Day, bringing you the day's top stories as well as the latest news and information, sport and weather.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Enjoying the bounty of Autumn, Analiese harvests her first honey, goes on her first hunt for venison, and takes her former boss and mentor, Peter Gilmore, foraging for wild mushrooms.

programme.title: Christmas Cabaret
programme.desc: Join comedian and host Nazeem Hussain for the Compass Christmas Cabaret! It's Christmas like you've never seen before. One hour of multi-faith comedians, guests plus musicians including Paul Kelly and Kate Miller-Heidke.

programme.title: Christmas In Australia With Christine Anu
programme.desc: Celebrate Christmas with Christine Anu as she explores how Australia's melting pot of traditions, cultures and faiths not only sparks festive joy, but rejoices in the kindness and resilience of Australians.

programme.title: Outback Vet Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - In the Karratha Vet Hospital, Katy treats a staffie with a deadly disease; and a Great Dane comes to the rescue of a dog needing a blood transfusion. In Exmouth, Rick and zoologist Ed Swinhoe test a wild dingo's DNA.

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Aaron and Holly yarn on Wurundjeri country near Melbourne, take in the mysteries of Hanging Rock-Ngannelong, and connect with deep time at an ancient quarry.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Peter Garrett is one of the nation's most intriguing rock stars. He's lived life on many stages, as front man of Midnight Oil, activist, and a politician. Anh creates a portrait as striking as the man himself. (Final)

programme.title: Compass Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 36 - Pentecostalism is one of the fastest growing religious movements in the world. What's the appeal and why are young people drawn to it? Compass visits the Life House Church in Murray Bridge, South Australia to find answers

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep104
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim.

programme.title: Australia Calling: 80 Years of International Broadcasting
programme.desc: In 1939 PM Menzies launched Australia's first international broadcast service Australia Calling. For more than 80 Years ABC has delivered an Australian perspective on the culture and events of the Asia Pacific.

programme.title: Christmas Sounds Better This Year
programme.desc: Every Christmas the same old songs are played so we got some talented people to compose new ones. In this heart-warming musical adventure we celebrate the Australian Christmas spirit at its very best.

programme.title: Classic Choir: Oh Christmas Tree
programme.desc: The ABC Classic Choir sing a new arrangement of a Christmas favourite 'Oh Christmas Tree (Yerrbill with Clarence)' with new lyrics by Gardening Australia's Clarence Slockee and musical arrangement by Joseph Twist.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - As Christmas across the Pacific beckons, the whole team, Sera, Sam, Tiana and Kiana, take a look back at their favourite stories, athletes and fans, throughout the year. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: Women in Sport Spotlight Ep1
programme.desc: ABC News puts the spotlight on women making a big impact in the sporting world - from the grassroots through to the elite level, with a focus on women from under-represented backgrounds. Presented by Amanda Shalala.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2022 Heywire project. Presented by Karla Ranby.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep11
programme.desc: Dinesh Palipana has a unique perspective on hospitals and patient care as only the second person with quadriplegia to graduate a doctor in Australia. He speaks about overcoming barriers and his life motto - carpe diem.

programme.title: Farewell to Leigh Sales - A 7.30 Special
programme.desc: We look back over Leigh Sales' 12 years as host of 7.30 including her most memorable interviews with some of the world's most powerful and famous figures, plus never-before-seen footage from behind the scenes.

programme.title: Neighbours: End of the Road
programme.desc: After 37 years the iconic global TV show Neighbours ended production in 2022. Before the finale in July, Margaret Paul looked at the show's impact as one of Australia's biggest exports and the many careers it helped launch.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep1
programme.desc: How deep will the housing downturn go? We speak to property analysts, economists and real estate agents about whether prices will rebound in 2023 plus top tips on buying or selling in this market. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep32
programme.desc: Madeleine Morris, Greg Jennett, Tony Armstrong and the team chat with talk show host Oprah Winfrey, global superstar Robbie Williams, comedian Shaun Micallef, author Jane Harper, plus Zak Hepburn with the latest movies.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep256
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Iskhandar Razak and Stephanie Ferrier bring you the latest overnight developments plus news and interviews, Charles Brice with sport and Emma Rebellato with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep60
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest news across the summer with the day's top stories, breaking news and up-to-the minute information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Surviving Extinction
programme.desc: Australia has some of the most unique animals anywhere on the planet and also one of the highest rates of threatened species. We look at efforts to save five unique Australian species that are on the verge of extinction.

programme.title: ABC News Summer Ep61
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest news across the summer with the day's top stories, breaking news and up-to-the minute information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep28

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
